mapper.sql:
lot.lot_id AS lotId, lot.lot_nm AS lotNm, lot.lot_qty AS lotQty, lot.item_id AS itemid, lot.lot_state AS lotState, itemInfo.item_nm AS itemNm, itemMgt.item_stock AS itemStock, rlesPlanTotal.rlesPlanTotal AS rlesPlanTotal, (lot.lot_qty-rlesPlanTotal.rlesPlanTotal) AS rlesPlanNeed, lotRlesQty.rlesWorkQty AS rlesWorkQty, (rlesPlanTotal.rlesPlanTotal-lotRlesQty.rlesWorkQty) AS rlesExceptQty, (lotRlesQty.rlesWorkQty-IFNULL(lotShipQty.shipEndQty,0)) AS rlesStockQty, shipPlanTotal.shipPlanTotal AS shipPlanTotal, (lot.lot_qty-shipPlanTotal.shipPlanTotal) AS shipPlanNeed, lotShipQty.shipEndQty AS shipEndQty, (shipPlanTotal.shipPlanTotal-lotShipQty.shipEndQty) AS shipExceptQty, orderInfo.order_id AS orderId, orderInfo.order_nm AS orderNm, lot.creator_id AS creatorId, lot.created_at AS createdAt, lot.updator_id AS updatorId, lot.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM prs_lot_info lot
LEFT OUTER JOIN prs_order_info orderInfo ON lot.order_id = orderInfo.order_id LEFT OUTER JOIN bc_item_info itemInfo ON lot.item_id = itemInfo.item_id LEFT OUTER JOIN cm_item_mgt itemMgt ON lot.lot_id = itemMgt.item_mgt_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT lot_id, SUM(rles_plan_qty) AS rlesPlanTotal FROM prs_rles_plan
GROUP BY lot_id )rlesPlanTotal ON lot.lot_id = rlesPlanTotal.lot_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT lot_id, SUM(ship_plan_qty) AS shipPlanTotal FROM prs_ship_plan
GROUP BY lot_id )shipPlanTotal ON lot.lot_id = shipPlanTotal.lot_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT lot.lot_id AS lotId, SUM(rlesMgt.rles_mgt_qty) AS rlesWorkQty FROM prs_lot_info lot
LEFT OUTER JOIN prs_rles_plan rlesPlan ON lot.lot_id = rlesPlan.lot_id LEFT OUTER JOIN prs_rles_mgt rlesMgt ON rlesPlan.rles_plan_id = rlesMgt.rles_plan_id GROUP BY lot.lot_id )lotRlesQty ON lot.lot_id = lotRlesQty.lotId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT lot.lot_id AS lotId, SUM(shipMgt.ship_qty) AS shipEndQty FROM prs_lot_info lot
LEFT OUTER JOIN prs_ship_plan shipPlan ON lot.lot_id = shipPlan.lot_id LEFT OUTER JOIN prs_ship_mgt shipMgt ON shipPlan.ship_plan_id = shipMgt.ship_plan_id GROUP BY lot.lot_id )lotShipQty ON lot.lot_id = lotShipQty.lotId WHERE 1=1
AND ${searchGubun} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND lot.lot_id = #{lotId}
